title: Before Colin: A Downright Delinquents Bonus Book
description: Hayley Larson had it all. Good looks, a loving father, a great best friend, and a hot new boy-toy. With how great things are, what could possibly go wrong?Get a glimpse of Hayley's charmed life before she gets admitted to the school of hell that is Downright Delinquents.
author: Lauren Jackson
